bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The version 0.8.8 packaged in Fedora is old and knows bugs fixed in the upstream repository.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 0.8.8 respectively 0.9.1
How reproducible: Always?
Steps to Reproduce: n/a
Actual results: n/a
Expected results: n/a
Additional info:
I'm currently using directly the version from hg::http://sousmonlit.zincube.net/~niol/repositories.hg/lazygal/ $ ./lazygal.py --version lazygal version 0.9.1
I was in contact with the upstream author, who had fixed the issues I had with the version currently packaged. The main issue was with incremental rendering of directories containing films, but also some spurious messages which don't appear with the HG-version.

Thanks for the report. lazygal was updated to 0.9.1 in f26+, but at the same time, I switched to using python3. That's not the kind of change that should be done in a stable release, so I've been postponing the update in f25 and older. I'll take a look at updating to 0.9.1 in f25 while staying with python2.
lazygal-0.9.1-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-d2d1343480
lazygal-0.9.1-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-a66cd4a7a3

lazygal-0.9.1-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-a66cd4a7a3

lazygal-0.9.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-d2d1343480
lazygal-0.9.1-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
lazygal-0.9.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
